issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
The appcelerator studio installation procedure  requires the ADT plugin to be downloaded from the google Web site.

But this plugin is no longer available from Google.

Hence the Appcelerator Studio cannot be  installed by following the documentation.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio installation procedure is not usable

comments.body:
Hi,
Thanks for reaching us. So far, we have been unable to reproduce it. 

From the Studio menu bar, select Help > Install New Software...
Click the Add button, to add the Google ADT Plugin update site

https://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/

Wait for the package list to be populated
Select all the resulting ADT packages
Click the Next button
Click the Next button on the Install Details screen that follows

I recommend you upgrade  Appcelerator Studio to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again. 


Regards,
Aminul
